name: Auto Rater
description: Automatically rates the stars of levels.

issues.info: You can report issues by either creating a new issue on the GitHub, or messaging me on Discord: @sweepsweep2

override-difficulty-rate.name: Override Rate Difficulty
override-difficulty-rate.description: If the rate mode is set to Override, the mod rates all levels with this difficulty (in stars).

na-override.name: NA Override
na-override.description: If the rate mode is set to Requested Difficulty or Current Difficulty and the one selected is NA, then it will rate the level in the way this setting specifies. (if the final difficulty is still NA, it will rate the level as if the Override mode is selected)
